mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To ignite transformative change through innovative solutions that empower growth and renewal.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where every ending becomes a new beginning, built on resilience and innovation.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: ASHES was born from the understanding that true innovation emerges from remnants. Like a phoenix rising, we believe every challenge holds opportunity for new beginnings.

brandValues.title: Brand Values
brandValues.description: The core principles that guide everything we do

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly push boundaries and embrace change to create breakthrough solutions.

resilience.title: Resilience
resilience.description: We transform challenges into opportunities, rising stronger from every setback.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: We stay true to our vision while adapting to the needs of those we serve.

colorPalette.title: Color Palette
colorPalette.description: Our carefully curated colors that define our visual identity

primary.name: Phoenix Purple
primary.usage: Primary brand actions, CTAs, and key highlights

secondary.name: Ember Blue
secondary.usage: Secondary elements, accents, and supporting visuals

accent.name: Ash Gray
accent.usage: Body text, subtle backgrounds, and neutral elements

typography.title: Typography
typography.description: Clear, modern fonts that convey professionalism and innovation

secondary.name: SF Pro Display
secondary.usage: Body text, paragraphs, and long-form content

logoUsage.title: Logo Usage Guidelines
logoUsage.description: Standards for proper logo implementation across all media

rules.detail: 48px height minimum for digital, 25mm for print
Maintain clear space equal to logo height on all sides
Do not distort, stretch, or rotate the logo
Use SVG for web, PNG for digital, AI/EPS for print
Ensure sufficient contrast with background colors
Use full color, monochrome, or inverted as specified

colorThemes.title: Color Themes in Action
colorThemes.description: See how our palette comes together in real applications

darkTheme.title: Dark Theme
darkTheme.description: Rich gradients and vibrant accents on dark backgrounds for high contrast and modern aesthetics

lightTheme.title: Light Theme
lightTheme.description: Clean aesthetics with subtle shadows and depth, optimized for readability and professional presentation

imagery.title: Imagery Style
imagery.description: Visual guidelines for photography and illustrations
guidelines: Maintain consistent color grading and tone
